title: What people who flash their mastery icon every time they get a kill think

replies.body:
How to set off a nuke 
Step 1. Riven is lame 
Step 2. Run...

EDIT: Run... FAST!!!!
http://orig05.deviantart.net/a770/f/2016/028/4/6/chara__undertale_genocide_route__by_mikncookies-d9pn1vt.jpg
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/06/running-away-fast-gif.gif?gs=a
http://static.zerochan.net/Chara.(Undertale).full.1973722.jpg
http://img.memecdn.com/shit-shit-shit-shit-shit-shit-shit-shit-shit_o_1116854.jpg
Who is this again?
chara
Chara who? From what?
Undertale. She's a strange character, lots of theories around her. Most people associate her with the genocide route and believe her to be that evil guiding voice as you slaughter everyone.
Oh, okay. Thought it was some anime or something.

meanwhile:

http://i.imgur.com/zTYTwVj.gif
boohoo

Unless it's Definitely Not Riven:

{{champion:102}} I offered to trade top for jungle and she actually gave up the opportunity to beat a poor lvl-1 top enemy senseless with broken wings for the first 2 minutes of the game.
{{champion:236}} o.O
{{champion:92}} \*total silence\*

*5 minutes later*

{{champion:102}} I'm extended, so, I'ma retreat and steal some jungle farms.
{{champion:92}} Okay.
{{champion:102}} ...

*3 minutes later*

{{champion:92}} Woops. Fail gank. Sorry.
{{champion:102}} Wha... you just... that was an apolo... what is... I don't... reported.

"Defiantly."
http://www.d-e-f-i-n-i-t-e-l-y.com may be of use.
http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/if-your-a-grammar-nazi.jpg
You're a terrible person.

Your*

It's not about what's correct. It's about sending a message.

Speaking of which... its*.

Also whats* and... you know what, let me just rewrite the whole thing.

>Its not about whats correct, Its about sendin o' message
it's not about grammar it's about using the completely wrong word.
Honestly, I don't really care about Riven. She isn't that good compared to other champions.
http://pre14.deviantart.net/16ce/th/pre/i/2016/117/d/3/do_you_want_to_have_a_bad_time__by_megustakatz-da0ez37.jpg
It's a beautiful day outside, sun is shining, flowers are blooming. On days like today kids like you... should be burning in hell

> [{quoted}](name=redraider96,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UhBlkllo,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T01:08:34.267+0000)
>
> It's a beautiful day outside, birds are singing, flowers are blooming. On days like these, kids like you... should be burning in hell!

FTFY
.-. wut?
That's the actual line.
I know
Then what are you confused about?
FTFY?
**F**ixed **T**hat **F**or **Y**ou
yea, i just recently learned what TTYL meant... I'm 19

I've got a question for ya.. 

do you think even the worst person can change, that anyone can be a good person, if they just try?
Well, I'm going to Grillby's.... Papyrus, do you want anything?
burger pls
No. It's one's nature to be evil sometimes.

How to make someone very salty

"RUMBLE AND ALL THE YORDLES ARE BETTER THAN RIVEN AND EVERY OTHER NOXUS SCUM THERE IS IN THIS GAME!"

http://24.media.tumblr.com/0a8c5e0d1bb8bae4159f3b09835900ee/tumblr_n30ki5NrPi1s5tqioo2_500.gif

http://38.media.tumblr.com/292474be1ca10f35bd4fb6710fa6aa3c/tumblr_mpmy09YZQO1sz9qdmo1_500.gif

Come at me bro!

http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s390/leagueoflosers/3b2303ef2f00acb8db2846e9ed66163a.gif

But of course, Teemo is the best.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/873/638/86f.gif

That little rodent with a blowdart?

Get on my level bro.

http://img05.deviantart.net/f207/i/2014/133/9/2/super_galaxy_rumble_by_capcomcc-d7i7493.jpg

https://31.media.tumblr.com/62d4add67f5a885bf8a4e916ef8e8bd1/tumblr_inline_n7smbowsXk1r7ejbg.gif
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2F3HnJg43.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
http://img01.deviantart.net/9e6b/i/2016/055/8/c/undertale__chara_by_madotto-d9otinp.jpg

So you want to have a bad time? Just like Laughing Fish!

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/vsbattles/images/8/8c/Sans_sprite.png/revision/latest?cb=20151108030000
Riven is more boring to play than Vladimir... *puts on running shoes* and Lux is better. *buys life insurance*

Defiantly true. 
The truth doesn't care what you think. It will defy all preconceptions.

Save it for when you mess up.

*accidentally ults own team against Amumu+Orianna*

*shink**

What people who flash their mastery every time the support and jungle save their ass and get a kill, think:

"planned"

What people who flash their mastery every time they're tilted and about to die for the 10th time in the same way as the last 9 times, think:

\*poker ... ... face\* \*poker... FACE\* \*POKER FACE\* \*WHY ISN'T THE BLUFF WORKING!!!\*
Vayne did it on URF while she killed my Brand, then I soloed her and danced on her corpse.

I usually think of gems when I flash mine.



http://www.auplod.com/u/ulaopd785ed.png
Well it's kind of the combo you use when jumping on an ADC as {{champion:107}}
I always flash it when I get killed just to show how much of a scrub I am.

play zed, flash the "hard to earn" mastery, dance when low and spam mastery whole game
types allchat: lol "outplayed"
